text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Main Moroccan opposition parties urge Arab governments to freeze all ties with Israel.
- Russia's Foreign Minister Yevgeny Primakov to arrive on Sunday in Rabat on a two-day official visit.
- U.S. businesmen visit Morocco on Monday to meet local counterparts and ministers.
- Tangier criminal court sentences 75 young people for disobedience during riots last June.
